context: Could you recommend any books similar to In the Woods?
Sure! Do you like books by Tana French? She also wrote The Likeness.
I have never heard of Tana French before. What other books did she write?
Tana French is the author of Into the Woods. She also wrote Faithful Place and Broken Harbor. Do you want other recommendations?
I know that The Likeness and Into the Woods are both mysteries. Do you know of any similar mysteries by different authors?
resp: You may want to check out The Sleeping Doll, it is written by Jeffery Deaver. The Sleeping Doll also has genre Suspense.

While it doesn't have traditional enchanting fantasy elements, it does have a captivating and mysterious setting that may appeal to fans of fantasy.
